text: Arie den Hartog (23 April 1941 – 7 June 2018) was a Dutch road bicycle racer. Hartog won the Milan–San Remo Classic in 1965, as well as the Amstel Gold Race in 1967. He was born in Zuidland, Netherlands. Hartog died in The Hague on 7 June 2018 at the age of 77. ==References== ==Other websites== *Profile by cyclinghalloffame.com Category:1941 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Dutch cyclists Category:Sportspeople from South Holland
title: Arie den Hartog
